data.meta_description: All Obituaries - Marcus D. Brown Funeral Home, Inc. offers a variety of funeral services, from traditional funerals to competitively priced cremations, serving Anderson, SC, Calhoun Falls, SC and the surrounding communities. We also offer funeral pre-planning and carry a wide selection of caskets, vaults, urns and burial containers.
